name: Intake Admissibility
description: Semantic set for evaluating intake document admissibility. Measures completeness, consistency, and actionability of structured intake artifacts per SR-SEMANTIC-ORACLE-SPEC.

axes.name: Schema Compliance
axes.description: Measures adherence to the Intake schema (required fields, types)

axes.name: Traceability Coverage
axes.description: Measures coverage of inputs and deliverables with explicit refs

axes.name: Contradiction-Free
axes.description: Measures absence of contradictory statements in constraints and objectives

axes.name: Ambiguity Bounded
axes.description: Measures that ambiguities are explicit and inventoried in unknowns

axes.name: Privacy Safe
axes.description: Measures absence of PII or sensitive data in public fields

axes.name: Term Map Aligned
axes.description: Measures alignment between definitions and usage in constraints/deliverables

constraints.description: All required Intake fields must be present and non-empty
Each deliverable must have a valid path
Objective and constraints must not contradict each other
Ambiguous terms should be listed in unknowns or definitions
No personally identifiable information in public fields
Defined terms are used consistently throughout

decision_rule.description: Pass if all required axes meet thresholds and no error violations
